metadata.title: CVE-2019-9073 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.32. It is an attempted excessive memory allocation in _bfd_elf_slurp_version_tables in elf.c.

criterions.comment: binutils package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.34-5ubuntu1').
